meanings.definition: To make urban or sophisticated in character
meanings.sent1: She cityfied her wardrobe by adding trendy accessories.
meanings.sent2: The artist cityfied the mural with vibrant colors and modern shapes.
meanings.sent3: The small town cat tried to act cityfied by wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: His music was cityfied with a mix of electronic beats and jazz melodies.
meanings.sent5: The old house was cityfied with sleek glass windows and a rooftop garden.

meanings.definition: To adapt to city life or customs
meanings.sent1: After moving to the city, she quickly cityfied her daily routine.
meanings.sent2: The rural family slowly cityfied their traditions to fit in with the urban community.
meanings.sent3: The country dog was cityfied when it started barking at passing taxis.
meanings.sent4: Her accent slowly cityfied as she spent more time in the bustling metropolis.
meanings.sent5: The farm boy's style gradually cityfied as he explored the downtown shops.
